fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`VPMOVWB xmm1/m64 {k1}{z}, xmm2`
`VPMOVSWB xmm1/m64 {k1}{z}, xmm2`
`VPMOVUSWB xmm1/m64 {k1}{z}, xmm2`
`VPMOVWB xmm1/m128 {k1}{z}, ymm2`
`VPMOVSWB xmm1/m128 {k1}{z}, ymm2`
`VPMOVUSWB xmm1/m128 {k1}{z}, ymm2`
`VPMOVWB ymm1/m256 {k1}{z}, zmm2`
`VPMOVSWB ymm1/m256 {k1}{z}, zmm2`
`VPMOVUSWB ymm1/m256 {k1}{z}, zmm2`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: VPMOVWB down converts 16-bit integers into packed bytes using truncation. VPMOVSWB converts signed 16-bit integers into packed signed bytes using signed saturation. VPMOVUSWB convert unsigned word values into unsigned byte values using unsigned saturation.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: The source operand is a ZMM/YMM/XMM register. The destination operand is a YMM/XMM/XMM register or a 256/128/64-bit memory location.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: Down-converted byte elements are written to the destination operand (the first operand) from the least-significant byte. Byte elements of the destination operand are updated according to the writemask. Bits (MAXVL-1:256/128/64) of the register destination are zeroed.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: Note: EVEX.vvvv is reserved and must be 1111b otherwise instructions will #UD.
